#summary Usage instructions

= Usage =

Usage:
  # Underline words which you want to translate on a page.
  # Scan the page and treat it by an OCR software which recognize underlined words. Fine Reader 11 can do that job.
  # OCRed document shall be stored in html format.
  # Load the html file to the program.
  # Translation tree is fetched from a web dictionary.
  # Choose proper translations from the tree by pushing Return key. This cause translations be added to the result list. The best way to navigate is using up/down arrows. Using mouse is much more slower.
  # Result list can be saved to txt file or in "Pytacz Master" format (http://pytacz-master.softonic.pl/) which is a vocabulary learning software.

Now, there is only Polish, English and German language.

= Examples =
There are some html examples in 'data' directory in the repo. You can test the program on them before you install an OCR software.
